carrier_master.hq_address: West Memphis, AR area (~10 miles from LHS hub)
carrier_master.driver_satisfaction_notes: 4.3 star rating = highest driver satisfaction in pipeline. Small fleet, drivers known by name. Ideal pilot partner.
carrier_master.fit_rationale: 10 miles from West Memphis hub. 4.3 star driver satisfaction = happy drivers give best testimonials. Only 2 facilities = massive terminal gap (LHS adds 4 more). Small fleet = fast decision, easy pilot (10-20 Flex Passes). Ideal proof-of-concept partner.
carrier_master.primary_pitch_angle: 10-20 driver Flex Pass pilot — your drivers are 10 minutes away
carrier_master.secondary_pitch_angle: Collect testimonials from happiest drivers in pipeline, use in every subsequent carrier pitch
carrier_master.pilot_strategy: 10-20 Flex Pass pilot. Collect driver testimonials. Use Mid South success story in Ozark, Empire, CalArk pitches.
carrier_master.exec_summary: Mid South Transport is a small (110 trucks) carrier ~10 miles from the West Memphis LHS hub with the highest driver satisfaction in the pipeline (4.3 stars). Ideal pilot partner: fast decision, happy drivers, great testimonials. Proof of concept for entire pipeline.
